attributes.action: Require my MP to vote to leave the EU & vote the way his/her constituents voted.
attributes.background: My MP is not voting in line with the wishes of his/her constituents - this is particularly important with Brexit. It’s not about the views of a individual or party. I require my MP to vote as per the clear instructions given in the referendum and respect democracy.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
